        • Method Detail

          • boolean artifactExists(java.lang.String group, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String version)

          • java.util.List<Artifact> findByGroupAndName(java.lang.String group, java.lang.String name, int pageNumber, int perPageSize)

            Locate an Artifact based on the (group, name) pair

            Parameters:
            group - A valid group name (e.g. "com.example")
            name - The artifact's name (e.g. "dropwizard-core")

          • java.util.List<Artifact> findByQuery(java.lang.String value, int pageNumber, int perPageSize)

            Locate an Artifact based on generic query parameter

            Parameters:
            value - the query value for searching. It can be partially specified, for example to find all version 1.0.1 and 1.0.2 artifacts, the value can be 1.0.
            name - The artifact's name (e.g. "dropwizard-core")

          • Artifact findLatestByGroupAndName(java.lang.String group, java.lang.String name)

            Locate the latest Artifact based on the (group, name) pair

            Parameters:
            group - A valid group name (e.g. "com.example")
            name - The artifact's name (e.g. "dropwizard-core")
